verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:30
verses.text: And he turned from him toward another, and spake after the same manner: and the people answered him again after the former manner.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:31
verses.text: And when the words were heard which David spake, they rehearsed them before Saul: and he sent for him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:32
verses.text: And David said to Saul, Let no man’s heart fail because of him; thy servant will go and fight with this Philistine.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:33
verses.text: And Saul said to David, Thou art not able to go against this Philistine to fight with him: for thou art but a youth, and he a man of war from his youth.
